entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:40PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water on the Tanana River and Tributaries Draining the Alaska Range into the Weekend... High water on the Tanana River and tributaries draining the Alaska Range will continue into the weekend. This includes the Chisana River, Nabesna River, Gerstle River, Delta River, and the Nenana River. The Tanana River is running at bankfull.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...NEAR-CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS SUNDAY AND LABOR DAY... Fire weather concerns are expected on Sunday and Labor Day as hotter air moves into the region, afternoon relative humidity values drop into the 20s and 30s and southwest winds gust to around 25 mph. Under these conditions, fires will start and spread easily.
